content.question: Which of the following observations is most consistent with the information in the circle graph?

choices.label: Over 75% of the files stored are 1 MB in size or less.
Over 75% of the files stored are 10 MB in size or less.
Over 75% of the files stored are at least 100 KB in size.
Over 75% of the files stored are at least 1 MB in size.

content.answer: Over 75% of the files stored are 10 MB in size or less.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
